［深層ＮＥＷＳ］２閣僚辞任「野党が力を持ち、政治に緊張感を」

07 Nov 2019, 14:59

　自民党の石原伸晃元経済再生相と国民民主党の玉木代表が７日、ＢＳ日テレの「深層ＮＥＷＳ」に出演し、菅原一秀・前経済産業相と河井克行・前法相の辞任などについて議論した。
　石原氏は「批判を重く受け止めなければいけない」と述べた。玉木氏は「（安倍内閣が）自爆している。重要課題を議論できる環境を政府・与党に整えてもらいたい」と注文を付けた。同じく番組に出演した一橋大の中北浩爾教授は「もう少し野党が力を持って、政治に緊張感を持たせることが必要ではないか」と求めた。

[Deep NEWS] 2 Ministers resigned "Opposition has power and tension in politics"

07 Nov 2019, 14:59

Liberal Democratic Party Nobuyoshi Ishihara and Minister of National Democratic Party Tamaki Tamaki appeared in BS NTV's “Deep NEWS” on the 7th to discuss the resignation of Kazuhide Sugawara, former Minister of Economy, Trade and Industry, Katsuyuki Kawai, and former Minister of Justice.
Mr. Ishihara said, "We must take the criticism seriously." Mr. Tamaki placed an order saying, “(Abe Cabinet) is suicide. I want the government and ruling party to prepare an environment where important issues can be discussed.” Prof. Hirokazu Nakakita, Hitotsubashi University, who also appeared in the program, asked, “It is necessary for the opposition party to have a little more power and to give tension to politics.”
